text: Muirkirk Football Club are a Scottish football club, based in the village of Muirkirk, East Ayrshire. Nicknamed the Kirk, they were formed in 1937, and they play at Burnside Park. Currently playing in the . The team has been managed by Kevin Muirhead, formerly of Newmains United and Hamilton Accies, since October 2017 replacing George Grierson.http://www.cumnockchronicle.com/sport/15604364.New_Muirkirk_boss_Muirhead_is_looking_to_build_for_the_future/https://twitter.com/Muirkirkjfchttp://www.dailyrecord.co.uk/sport/local- sport/kevin-muirhead-takes-over-newmains-8133668 Over the club's 80 year history, many players have made the move to senior clubs. John McGuiganhttps://www.11v11.com/players/john-mcguigan-33535/ started as a youngster at Muirkirk before going on to play with Newcastle United, Southampton and Swansea City, Bernie Kellyhttp://www.londonhearts.com/SFL/players/bernardkelly.htmlhttp://www.fifetoday.co.uk/sport/bernie- kelly-star-of-a-great-raith-team-1-166241 went on to play with Leicester City and Middlesbrough, and Eric Caldow notched up 265 appearances for Rangers. ==Current squad== As of 5 September 2020 ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Role !!
